doc.title: This Is Emily Yeung
doc.plot: This is Emily Yeung is the follow-up to the award winning hit series, This is Daniel Cook. In this new series, six-year-old Emily takes on the world with her own unique perspective. She's joined on her adventures by everyone from snake handlers to professional basketball players; from stuffed animal makers to upside down pineapple cake bakers. Whoever her guest may be, inquisitive Emily is always up for a new experience or challenge.
